message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for sale that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested, $150 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway at $125. What do you say?
I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I can meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
